system_utterance: ठीक है , अगर आप अपने दोस्तों के साथ घूमना चाहते हैं , तो Humble Administrator's Garden एक nice place है. It is a traditional Suzhou-style garden and also near to your home आपके घर के पास भी है ।
db_results: Database search results: the number of successful matches is 8

db_results.name: Humble Administrator's Garden
db_results.address: number 178 , डोंगबेई स्ट्रीट , गुसु जिला , Suzhou सिटी
db_results.features: a UNESCO World Heritage Site and one of China's Four Famous Gardens.

db_results.name: Huqiu Scenic Area
db_results.address: No. 8, Shanmennei, Huqiu District, Suzhou City
db_results.features: You can enjoy the beautiful scenery of mountains and Jiangnan gardens, learn more about the Spring and Autumn Period and visit the leaning Huqiu Pagoda.

db_results.name: Lingering Garden
db_results.address: No. 338, Liuyuan Road, Changmenwai, Gusu District, Suzhou City
db_results.features: In the Suzhou-styled garden with humbleness, there are three treasures: Guanyun Peak, Nanmu Hall, and fish fossils.

db_results.name: Shantang Street
db_results.address: the northwest corner of Gusu Old Town, Gusu District, Suzhou City
db_results.features: You can enjoy the scenery of old Suzhou, visit the old guild hall and other historical sites, take a cruise on the river and take photos of the beautiful night scenery.

db_results.name: Pingjiang Road
db_results.address: No. 65, Baita East Road, Gusu District, Suzhou City, Jiangsu Province
db_results.features: Walk around the well-preserved ancient blocks, watch the bridges and flowing water, visit the literary and artistic shops, and eat delicious food.

db_results.name: Guanqian Street
db_results.address: Guanqian Street, Gusu District, Suzhou City.
db_results.features: You can try food from time-honored Suzhou brands, such as Songhelou Restaurant, Huang Tianyuan, and visit Xuanmiao Temple, the place that gave the street its name.

db_results.name: Master of the Nets Garden
db_results.address: No. 11 Kuojiatou Alley, Daichengqiao Road, Gusu District, Suzhou
db_results.features: It is a famous fine garden with traditional opera performances at night.

db_results.name: Shilu Pedestrian Street
db_results.address: Shilu Pedestrian Street, Jinchang District, Suzhou City
db_results.features: The Stone Road was built during the Westernization Movement in the late Qing. The road is paved with stones, thereof the name "Stone Road". Here you'll find many famous stores with a long history.

db_results.name: Hanshan Temple
